name: drtrips-google-mcp
description: MCP server for Google Places API with geocoding, place search, and place details via stdio

GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY.description: Google Maps API key with Places API enabled

tools.name: geocode_address
tools.description: Convert an address to geographic coordinates (latitude/longitude)

tools.name: get_place_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a place using Google Place ID or search query
